mapper.select: select id, order_id, product_id, product_name, quantity, unit_price, total_price from purchase_order_item where order_id = #{orderId} order by id asc
select id, order_id, product_id, product_name, quantity, unit_price, total_price from purchase_order_item where id = #{id}

SELECT s.id AS supplierId, s.name AS supplierName, SUM(poi.total_price) AS totalAmount FROM purchase_order_item poi JOIN purchase_order po ON poi.order_id = po.id JOIN supplier s ON po.supplier_id = s.id WHERE po.create_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY s.id, s.name ORDER BY totalAmount DESC

SELECT id, order_id AS orderId, product_id, product_name, unit_price, quantity, total_price FROM purchase_order_item
AND order_id = #{purchaseOrderId}
AND product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{productName}, '%')
ORDER BY id ASC
